Issue.description: Currently libvcx tests use hard-coded unix/style paths for temporary files (e.g. https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk/blob/598bd15349f0dd110d75ddce355031c0454ec53c/vcx/libvcx/src/settings.rs#L325|https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk/blob/598bd15349f0dd110d75ddce355031c0454ec53c/vcx/libvcx/src/settings.rs#L325, ).
